text: William McReynolds Agee (January 5, 1938 – December 20, 2017) was an American business executive. He was born in Boise, Idaho. In 1976 at age 38, he was appointed president and chief executive officer (CEO) of the Bendix Corporation. From 1988 to 1995, Agee was the chairman, president, and CEO of Morrison-Knudsen. Agee died of complications of respiratory failure at a Seattle hospital on December 20, 2017 at the age of 79.William Agee, ’70s C.E.O. Whose Star Was Dimmed, Dies at 79 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Washington (state) Category:Businesspeople from Idaho Category:People from Boise, Idaho
title: William Agee
